TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit SqlCacheDependencyAdmin extends System.Object
public ref class SqlCacheDependencyAdmin abstract sealed

summary.span: 在 SQL Server 資料庫上執行所需的管理工作，以在使用輪詢式相依性時支援 類別。

span.span: Performs administrative tasks required on a SQL Server database to support the class when using polling-based dependencies.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個類別的方法，以程式設計方式啟用和停用 SQL Server 資料庫資料表和其資料表物件變更通知。You can use the methods of this class to programmatically enable and disable a SQL Server database and its tables for object change notifications. 此外，此類別可取得的資訊的資料庫中的資料表已啟用變更通知使用方法。In addition, this class obtains information about which tables in a database are enabled for change notifications using the method. 不過，您也可以使用 Aspnet_regsql 命令列工具來管理 SQL Server 資料庫與資料表的變更通知。However, you can also use the Aspnet_regsql command-line tool to manage change notifications for a SQL Server database and its tables. > [!NOTE] > 若要呼叫此類別中的任何一種方法，您用來存取 SQL Server 資料庫的帳戶必須具有建立資料表和預存程序的權限。To call any of the methods in this class, the account you use to access the SQL Server database must have permissions to create tables and stored procedures. 若要啟用特定資料表上的通知，您必須在該資料表上建立 SQL Server 觸發程序的權限。To enable notifications on a specific table, you must have permissions to create a SQL Server trigger on that table. 如需有關如何在資料庫上設定權限的詳細資訊，請參閱 SQL Server 文件。For more information on how to set permissions on a database, see the SQL Server documentation. 如需 ASP.NET 處理序所使用的帳戶的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 模擬](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a0cb3024-562f-4184-9d3c-095504787d3d)。For more information about the account used by the ASP.NET process, see [ASP.NET Impersonation](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a0cb3024-562f-4184-9d3c-095504787d3d). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是簡單的 ASP.NET 頁面，啟用和停用 SQL Server 資料庫資料表上的變更通知。The following code example is a simple ASP.NET page for enabling and disabling change notifications on SQL Server database tables. 它會使用物件來管理呼叫的連接字串中指定的資料庫中的變更通知`MyConnectionString`。It uses the object to manage change notifications in the database specified in a connection string called `MyConnectionString`. 此範例包含兩個檔案，定義使用者介面的.aspx 檔案和包含 ASP.NET 事件的程式碼的程式碼後置檔案。The example includes two files, an .aspx file that defines the user interface and a code-behind file containing the source code for the ASP.NET events. 第一個範例會定義使用者介面的.aspx 檔案。The first sample is the .aspx file that defines the user interface. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin/CS/cacheDependencyAdmincs.aspx#10)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin/VB/cacheDependencyAdminvb.aspx#10)] 第二個範例是包含網頁事件的程式碼的程式碼後置檔案。The second sample is the code-behind file containing the source code for the page events. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin/CS/cacheDependencyAdmincs.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin/VB/cacheDependencyAdminvb.aspx.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void DisableNotifications (string connectionString);

param.name: connectionString
param.span: 用來連接 SQL Server 資料庫的連接字串。

span.span: A connection string used to connect to the SQL Server database.

summary.span: 停用指定資料庫的 變更告知。

span.span: Disables change notifications for the specified database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會從指定的資料庫中移除變更通知支援`connectionString`參數。The method removes support for change notifications from the database specified in the `connectionString` parameter. 一旦執行方法，您必須執行方法，如果您想要重新啟用變更告知的資料庫。Once you have run the method, you must run the method if you wish to re-enable change notifications for a database. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法，以停用變更連接字串所指定之資料庫的通知`MyConnectionString`。The following code example uses the method to disable change notifications for the database specified by the connection string `MyConnectionString`. 若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. [!code-vb[CachingSamples_SqlCacheDependencyAdmin#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CachingSamples_SqlCacheDependencyAdmin/VB/sqlcachedep2vb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 無法建立與資料庫的連接。

span.span: A connection to the database could not be established.
-or-

exception.span: ASP.NET 應用程式的安全性內容無權連接到資料庫。

span.span: The security context of the ASP.NET application does not have permission to connect to the database.
-or-

exception.span: ASP.NET 應用程式的安全性內容無權停用資料庫的告知。

span.span: The security context of the ASP.NET application does not have permission to disable notifications for the database.

summary.span: 在 SQL Server 資料庫資料表或資料庫資料表陣列上，停用 變更告知。

span.span: Disables change notifications on a SQL Server database table or an array of database tables.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void DisableTableForNotifications (string connectionString, string table);
.method public static hidebysig void DisableTableForNotifications(string connectionString, string table) cil managed
Public Shared Sub DisableTableForNotifications (connectionString As String, table As String)
public: static void DisableTableForNotifications(System::String ^ connectionString, System::String ^ table);

param.name: connectionString
param.span: 用來連接 SQL Server 資料庫的連接字串。

span.span: A connection string used to connect to the SQL Server database.

param.name: table
param.span: 要停用變更告知的資料庫資料表。

span.span: The database table on which to disable change notifications.

summary.span: 在 SQL Server 資料庫資料表上停用 變更告知。

span.span: Disables change notifications on a SQL Server database table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法停用異動中指定之資料表的通知`table`參數中指定的資料庫中必須是`connectionString`參數。The method disables change notifications for the table specified in the `table` parameter, which must be in the database specified in the `connectionString` parameter. 一旦您已經使用方法，以停用變更資料表的通知，您必須使用其中一個多載，如果您想要重新啟用變更通知。Once you have used the method to disable change notifications for a table, you must use one of the overloads if you wish to re-enable change notifications. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會停用變更連接字串中指定的資料表上的通知`MyConnectionString`。The following code example disables change notification on a table specified in the connection string `MyConnectionString`. 若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin/CS/cacheDependencyAdmincs.aspx.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin/VB/cacheDependencyAdminvb.aspx.vb#7)]

summary.span: 在 SQL Server 資料庫資料表的陣列上，停用 變更告知。

span.span: Disables change notifications on an array of SQL Server database tables.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法移除變更通知中指定的資料表從`tables`參數。The method removes change notifications from the tables specified in the `tables` parameter. 這些資料表都必須在指定的資料庫中`connectionString`參數。These tables must be in the database specified in the `connectionString` parameter. 一旦您已經使用方法，以停用變更的資料表清單的通知，您必須使用其中一個多載，如果您想要重新啟用變更通知。Once you have used the method to disable change notifications for a list of tables, you must use one of the overloads if you wish to re-enable change notifications.

span.span: Enables change notifications on the specified database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將支援變更通知中指定的資料庫從`connectionString`參數。The method adds support for change notifications from the database specified in the `connectionString` parameter. 一旦執行方法，您必須執行方法，如果您想要停用變更資料庫的通知。Once you have run the method, you must run the method if you wish to disable change notifications for a database. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法，才能變更連接字串所指定之資料庫的通知`MyConnectionString`。The following code example uses the method to enable change notifications for the database specified by the connection string `MyConnectionString`. 若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. span.span: Connects to a SQL Server database and prepares a database table or tables for change notifications.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void EnableTableForNotifications (string connectionString, string table);

public: static void EnableTableForNotifications(System::String ^ connectionString, System::String ^ table);

param.name: connectionString
param.span: 用來連接 SQL Server 資料庫的連接字串。

span.span: A connection string used to connect to the SQL Server database.

param.name: table
param.span: 要啟用變更告知的資料庫資料表。

span.span: The database table on which to enable change notifications.

summary.span: 連接到指定的 SQL Server 資料庫，並啟用指定資料庫資料表的 變更告知。

span.span: Connects to the specified SQL Server database and enables the specified database table for change notifications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將指定的資料表中的變更通知`table`參數中指定的資料庫中必須是`connectionString`參數。The method adds change notifications for the table specified in the `table` parameter, which must be in the database specified in the `connectionString` parameter. 一旦您已經使用方法，將資料表變更通知，您必須使用其中一個多載，如果您想要停用變更通知。Once you have used the method to add change notifications to a table, you must use one of the overloads if you wish to disable change notifications. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法，以啟用變更通知的連接字串中指定的資料庫中之指定資料表`MyConnectionString`。The following code example uses the method to enable change notifications on the specified table in the database specified in the connection string `MyConnectionString`. 若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. span.span: Connects to the specified SQL Server database and enables the specified array of database tables for change notification.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將變更通知中指定的資料表`tables`參數。The method adds change notifications for the tables specified in the `tables` parameter. 這些資料表都必須在指定的資料庫中`connectionString`參數。These tables must be in the database specified in the `connectionString` parameter. 一旦您已經使用方法，將一組資料表變更通知，您必須使用其中一個多載，如果您想要停用變更通知。Once you have used the method to add change notifications to a group of tables, you must use one of the overloads if you wish to disable change notifications. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法，才能變更連接字串中指定的資料庫中以分號分隔清單中指定的資料表上的通知`MyConnectionString`。The following code example uses the method to enable change notifications on the tables specified in a semicolon-delimited list in the database specified in the connection string `MyConnectionString`. 若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. span.span: A connection string used to connect to the SQL Server database.

summary.span: 擷取字串陣列，其包含 SQL Server 資料庫中每個已啟用變更告知的資料表名稱。

span.span: Retrieves a string array containing the name of every table that is enabled for change notifications in a SQL Server database.

returns.span: 字串陣列，其包含 SQL Server 資料庫資料表名稱。

span.span: A string array that contains the names of the SQL Server database tables.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回字串陣列，包含在指定的資料庫中的所有資料表的名稱`connectionString`已啟用變更通知的參數。The method returns a string array containing the names of all tables in the database specified in the `connectionString` parameter that are enabled for change notifications. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立資料表啟用變更通知，在連接字串中指定的資料庫中的字串陣列`MyConnectionString`。The following code example creates a string array of the tables enabled for change notifications in the database specified in the connection string `MyConnectionString`. 若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic.
